name: Orchid
description:
Orchid started in mid-2009, and we’ve been building and creating things ever since. We started out as a full-service web agency, and have since specialised as a custom web and app development company.
Our passion is creating simple, elegant web apps or mobile apps that solve problems your business is facing (or takes advantage of opportunities you want to capitalise on).
We’re a New Zealand company that’s based in Albany on Auckland’s North Shore.
